title: Snake Game
text:
Simple C++ game featuring a bot that uses the Dijkstra algorithm implemented in O(n).

title: Web Scraper
text:
Automatically shops on the web, looking for products with specific characteristics under a price threshold. It updates a sheets document and notifies me.
(Python, Selenium, Google apis)

title: Web Game
text:
A web game for movie buffs who want to challenge their knowledge of their favorite movies.
(Python, Flask, ffmpeg, Cloudinary api, html, js)

title: Isometric wireframe projection
text: A graphical project in C made as part of my studies at 42.

title: Philosophers
text: A puzzle in C as part of my studies at 42 where N threads must share ressources fairly. I worked with threads, mutexes, forks and semaphores.
